concept.title: 253.213 SIMPLIFIED ACQUISITION PROCEDURES (SF'S 18, 30, 44, 1165, 1449, AND OF'S 336, 347, AND 348).

conbody.p: (f) DoD uses the DD Form 1155, Order for Supplies or Services, instead of OF 347; and OF 336, Continuation Sheet, instead of OF 348. Follow the procedures at PGI 253.213(f) for use of forms.
